snippet: Apple retail-store workers complained that the policy of checking employees’ bags as a security precaution was embarrassing and demeaning.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge William Alsup in San Francisco dismisses class action suit by Apple retail employees over bag-search practices at company's California stores.
lead_paragraph: Apple retail-store workers complained that the policy of checking employees’ bags as a security precaution was embarrassing and demeaning.

headline.main: Apple Class Action Lawsuit Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Class Action Facing Apple Is Dismissed
